english_example_sentence: You have always apparently given great help to people in difficult situations.
russian_example_sentence: Вы, по-видимому, всегда оказывали большую помощь людям, находящимся в трудной ситуации.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, zor durumdaki insanlara her zaman büyük yardım etmişsiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, zor durumdaki insanlara her zaman büyük ______.
